data.title: Dire Political Scenarios | YouGov Poll Toplines: September 1 - 4, 2022
What do you believe the Confederate flag MOST represents?

President Trump said that if Democrats successfully impeach him, it will cause a “Civil War like fracture” in the country. If Trump were to be impeached, how likely or unlikely do you believe it is that there would be a Civil War-like fracture in the US?

summary.label: Public confederate memorials should be taken down, but ones in cemeteries should remain

data.title: As the move to remove Confederate statues has increased around the country, some are pushing to remove memorials to Confederate soldiers in cemeteries. What comes closest to your view about this?
Do you think it's likely or unlikely that in the next 10-15 years the US will enter its second civil war?
